: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus Prime: Assuming they could recieve a message from us. Optimus' last order before the Maximal government took over was to end all transformer contact with organic races. He felt that we had done them too much harm by bringing our war to them. At that time all transformers withdrew from earth and nebulos, all targetmaster, headmaster and powermaster technology was eliminated. I'm not sure anyone on earth is capable of hearing us. The only cybertronian things left on earth are the ruins of Autobot City and the Ark.

Rodimus remembers this time in history well. He had been very opposed to this course of action and had let Optimus know it. Rodimus had let his targetmaster be taken away and returned to Cybertron. However after the government change and the great upgrade Rodimus continued to serve with Maximals when most Autobots were retired.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Blackfang: I'll even greet him on his way out!

Yggdrasil: Rodimus, what if he doesn't know? Do you think that we 
could send a message to Earth through a relay post in space?

> With

> > > > > > > > communication jammers still in place he would have to

> force 
> > > > field 
> > > > > > > around

<DIV><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Assuming they could recieve a message from us. Optimus' last order before the Maximal government took over was to end all transformer contact with organic races. He felt that we had done them too much harm by bringing our war to them. At that time all transformers withdrew from earth and nebulos, all targetmaster, headmaster and powermaster technology was eliminated. I'm not sure anyone on earth is capable of hearing us. The only cybertronian things left on earth are the ruins of Autobot City and the Ark.</P>
<P>Rodimus remembers this time in history well. He had been very opposed to this course of action and had let Optimus know it. Rodimus had let his targetmaster be taken away and returned to Cybertron. However after the government change and the great upgrade Rodimus continued to serve with Maximals when most Autobots were retired.</P>
